tool_description: This API provides School List in Indonesia by Province (Propinsi), City (Kabupaten), and District (Kecamatan).
name: Indonesia School List
title: Indonesia School List

api_list.name: School Detail
api_list.description: School Detail by sekolah_id_enkrip field that get by other endpoint (see List of School).

api_list.name: List of School in Sub-Disctrict (Kecamatan)
api_list.description: List of School in Sub-Disctrict (Kecamatan), this endpoint has school NPSN, and sekolah_id_enkrip field to lookup school detail in other endpoint.  See Example Result

api_list.name: Number of Schools in Indonesia Sub-District (Kecamatan)
api_list.description: Number of Schools in Indonesia Sub-District (Kecamatan), also return kode_wilayah that used in other endpoint. (See example result and find kode_wilayah  field)

api_list.name: Number of Schools in Indonesian City / District (Kabupaten / Kota)
api_list.description: Number of Schools in Indonesian City / District (Kabupaten / Kota), also return kode_wilayah that used in other endpoints (See Example response).

api_list.name: Number of Schools in the Province of Indonesia
api_list.description: Number of Schools in the Province of Indonesia, also return region code (kode_wilayah) that used in other endpoints
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-school-list.p.rapidapi.com/sekolah_nasional"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-school-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://indonesia-school-list.p.rapidapi.com/sekolah_nasional"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "indonesia-school-list.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
